channel.title: Malta|Cassia County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Malta|Cassia County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End ID-81 South at ID-77
item.description: End ID-81 South at ID-77 in Malta. Turn right for ID-77 north. Roadway continues southbound as RRHD (Raft River Highway District) 30S, following the former route of US-30S to the Utah state line.

item.title: End ID-81 South at ID-77
item.description: End ID-81 South at ID-77 in Malta. Use ID-77 north for City of Rocks National Preserve and Castle Rocks State Park.

item.title: ID-81 South at 4th St. N
item.description: ID-81 South at 4th St. N in Malta. Use 4th St. N (via Sublette Road) for I-84 junction.

item.title: ID-81 South - Malta
item.description: Entering Malta on ID-81 south. Speed Limit 45 MPH.

item.title: Begin ID-81 North Approaching ID-77
item.description: Begin of ID-81 north at ID-77 junction in Malta.

item.title: Begin ID-81 North at ID-77 North
item.description: Beginning of ID-81 north at ID-77 junction in Malta.
